actions.text: Amendment SA 3447 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 473.

Amendment SA 3447 proposed by Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3411. To require a report on veterans who would have been reported to the national instant criminal background check system and who die by suicide with a firearm.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3447 proposed by Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3447 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 473.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3447 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 473.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require a report on veterans who would have been reported to the national instant criminal background check system and who die by suicide with a firearm.
